product_name: ANUAHeartleaf Low pH Deep Cleansing Water
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingAnua Heartleaf Low pH Deep Cleansing Water is a gentle yet potent cleansing water to remove impurities and makeup residue. Suitable for those who are hesitant to double cleanse with an oil-based cleanser.
details: DetailsBenefitsLow pH cleansing water to remove impurities and makeup residueFor normal skinFree Of: Denatured Alcohols / Parabens / Artificial Color / Silicones / Sulfates / Mineral Oil / Methylchloroisothiazolinone / Methylisothiazolinone / Coal Tar Dyes / NutsKey IngredientsHeartleaf: Soothes sensitive skin irritations caused by dryness and helps maintain the skin's moisturePanthenol & Squalane: Soothes and hydrates skin, helping to finish the cleansing without strippingResearch Results98% removal of waterproof mascara95% removal of lipstick96% removal of eyebrow makeup97% removal of base makeup96.3% reduction of fine dust particles after cleansingSkin irritation test completedEye irritation alternative test completedItem 2634246How To UseSaturate a cotton pad thoroughly.Gently wipe from the inside to the outside of the face.Optional to double cleanse with a foaming cleanser.For color makeup, press and hold for 5 seconds before wiping.Can be used daily, AM & PM.IngredientsWater, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Dipropylene Glycol, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Panthenol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Squalane, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Saturate a cotton pad thoroughly.Gently wipe from the inside to the outside of the face.Optional to double cleanse with a foaming cleanser.For color makeup, press and hold for 5 seconds before wiping.Can be used daily, AM & PM.

reviews.headline: Strings my eyes, every time
reviews.comments: This product seems to work well enough to remove daily sunscreen and occasional makeup. I use as Step 1 in a double cleansing routine. I bought mine months ago and I still have plenty left. My eyes are pretty sensitive  but if I expose them to an irritant bit by bit, they usually get used to the product over time. Not with this stuff! I absolutely dread taking my eye makeup off with this. It stings every single time. Sometimes my vision is a bit blurry afterwards which I think is more the dissolving makeup + product getting in my eyes more than anything. But my eyes feel red and irritated for a while after using this stuff. Won't be buying again but my skin likes it enough to keep using it until it's gone.

reviews.headline: Best Micellar Water
reviews.comments: I love this cleansing water. I use it every morning and after oil cleansing in the evening. It's amazing how much it draws out of my pores. And no need to wash away!

reviews.headline: New daily cleansing stable
reviews.comments: I use this as a first clean in my double cleanse (im not a fan of oil cleansers) and i love this product. It works well, good value, and effectively removes makeup.

rollup.name: Heartleaf Low pH Deep Cleansing Water
